title: The Mind Body Rejuvenation Center - Tarzana, CA
description: Specialties: 20% off MASSAGE! We are a multi-disciplinary professional and clean practice that includes massage, acupressure, acupuncture, nutrition and counseling (mental health therapy). Ask about our Massage Membership! Established in 2015. The MBR Center was established by an Acupuncturist and a Psychotherapist, with the vision of providing a holistic experience in a safe and inviting environment to support, heal and guide the mind, body and spirit.
